### Meaning: 南朝梁殷芸《小说》：“有客相从，各言所志，或原为扬州刺史，或原多赀财，或原骑鹤上升。其一人曰：‘腰缠十万贯，骑鹤上扬州。’欲兼三者。”后因以“腰缠万贯”谓腰里装着很多钱，形容非常富有。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: 最近看到的遇到的的一些事情，让我不断思考人生，每个来到人世间，生命的价值。说实话，没有找到答案 也许答案在每个人努力的人生中 再回归到问题 结合自己 我是失败还是成功呢 不得而知 上了大学不代表就可以腰缠万贯 只能说你能谋生 勉强活着 无论别人怎么说怎么看 我自认为我是幸福的 这就够了。
target: Some things I have seen and experienced recently have always made me wonder about life, each person who comes to this earth, the purpose of life. I don't know if I'm successful or not, but I can't tell if I'm successful.

### Idiom: 石破天惊
### Meaning: 唐李贺《李凭箜篌引》：“女娲炼石补天处，石破天惊逗秋雨。”形容乐声高亢激越，有惊天动地之势。后多用以比喻某一事物或文章议论新奇惊人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 伦理担忧对ChatGPT也同样存在——它已展现出‘石破天惊’的智慧化一面，对很多领域产生破坏性，比较直接的例子是有大学生用其生成论文并获得高分。不仅如此，生成式人工智慧进化速度极快，ChatGPT去（2022）年11月推出后，今年3月迭代出的GPT-4，不仅知识面更广、对答更流畅，开始能够读懂图片内容，在律师资格考试中拿下高分，而且具备自我反思的能力。
target: Ethical concerns also exist for ChatGPT - it has already demonstrated its 'groundbreaking' intelligent side, causing disruptive effects in many fields. A more direct example is that college students have used it to generate papers and get high scores. Not only that, generative artificial intelligence evolves at an extremely fast speed. After ChatGPT was launched in November 2022, the GPT-4 that emerged in March this year not only has a wider range of knowledge, smoother answers, and the ability to understand the content of pictures, but also has the ability of self-reflection.

target: Hu Guang believed that the ministers should report political affairs to the Eastern Palace and that the Empress Dowager should also inspect political affairs, so they should understand the classics. Therefore, he asked Empress Dowager Shangguan to allow Xiahou Sheng to teach her the "Book of Documents". Xiahou Sheng was promoted to the position of Chief Steward of Changxin and was granted the title of Marquis within the Pass. Because he participated in the deposing and establishing of emperors and contributed to the stability of the ancestral temples and the national altars, he was granted a fiefdom of a thousand households. Emperor Xuan of Han had just ascended to the throne and wanted to praise the achievements of his predecessor. He issued a decree to the Prime Minister and the Grand Historian, saying: "I, with my humble and insignificant self, am fortunate to inherit the virtues of my ancestors, continue their sacred undertakings, and worship in the ancestral temple, day and night in thought."

### Idiom: 泥牛入海
### Meaning: 语本《景德传灯录·潭州龙山和尚》：“洞山又问和尚：‘见个什麽道理，便住此山？’师云：‘我见两个泥牛斗入海，直至如今无消息。’”后因以“泥牛入海”比喻一去不返，杳无消息。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 实际执行中，只要发现没有携带合法证件，就可能被当成“三无”人员被抓捕。然而，这些公民在向全国人大常委会要求启动合宪性审查之后，似“泥牛入海”无消息。对于公民启动合宪性审查程序，全国人大常委会法工委法规备案审查工作室并没有表示是否受理，是否进行了审查，也没有答复。
target: In actual implementation, as long as it is found that no legal documents are carried, one may be arrested as a "three-no" person (a person without identity, household registration, or legal status). However, after these citizens requested the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress to initiate a constitutional review, there was no news, like a "clay ox entering the sea". Regarding the initiation of the constitutional review process by citizens, the Legal Affairs Committee of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and the Regulations Filing Review Office did not indicate whether they accepted it, whether they conducted a review, and did not respond.

### Idiom: 群雄逐鹿
### Meaning: 群雄旧指许多有军事势力的人。逐鹿比喻争夺帝王之位。形容各派势力争夺最高统治地位。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 《三国演义》可大致分为黄巾起义、董卓之乱、群雄逐鹿、三国鼎立、三国归晋五大部分，描写了从东汉末年到西晋初年之间近百年的历史风云，以描写战争为主，诉说了东汉末年的群雄割据混战和魏、蜀、吴三国之间的政治和军事斗争，最终司马炎一统三国，建立晋朝的故事。该作品成书后有嘉靖壬午本等多个版本传于世，到了明末清初，毛宗岗对《三国演义》整顿回目、修正文辞、改换诗文，该版本也成为诸多版本中水平最高、流传最广的版本。
target: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" can be roughly divided into five parts: the Yellow Turban Uprising, the Dazhou Rebellion, the Pursuit of the Hare by the Turtles, the Three Kingdoms Period, and the Return to the Jin Dynasty. It describes the historical events of nearly a hundred years from the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty to the early Western Jin Dynasty, with an emphasis on war. It tells the story of the feudal lords' strife and struggle for power during the Eastern Han Dynasty, as well as the political and military conflicts between the Wei,蜀, and Wu Kingdoms. Finally, Sima Yan unified the Three Kingdoms and established the Jin Dynasty. The book has been passed down through the generations in various versions, including the Jiajing壬午本 edition. By the late Ming and early Qing Dynasties, Mao Zonggang revised the table of contents, corrected the text, and replaced the poems in the "Romance of the Three Kingdoms". This version is also one of the highest-quality and most widely circulated versions among all the versions.
